trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryServerDownException class exception is thrown when a server is unavailable to respond to a service request.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryServerDownException 클래스 예외 서버가 서비스 요청에 응답할 수 없을 때 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 지정된 된 오류 메시지를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 클래스를 지정 된 serialization 정보를 사용 하 고 상황에 맞는 스트리밍.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object for the exception.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message and an underlying exception object.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 된 지정된 된 오류 메시지 및 내부 예외 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message, a specified error code, and a specified server name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 된 지정된 된 오류 메시지, 지정 된 오류 코드 및 지정 된 서버 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An error code that identifies the error.
The name of the server that caused the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message, an underlying exception object, a specified error code, and a specified server name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 된 지정된 된 오류 메시지, 내부 예외 개체, 지정 된 오류 코드 및 지정 된 서버 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.
An error code that identifies the error.
The name of the server that caused the error.
Gets the error code for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 오류 코드를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that identifies the error.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 예외에 대 한 정보가 포함 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> serialize 된 throw 되는 예외에 대 한 개체 데이터를 보유 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>소스 또는 대상에 대 한 컨텍스트 정보를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the message that describes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> object error.
trans-unit.target: 설명 하는 메시지를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 개체 오류입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error.
Gets the name of the server that is associated with the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 서버의 이름을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the server that caused this error.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>이 오류가 발생 하는 서버의 이름이 들어 있는.</xref:System.String>
